description: There is a wall of fire in front of you. Behind the fire is a lowered bridge. On the other side of the bridge is the door to the next car. Behind you is a vase full of water. Next to you on the ground is a large button.
winningText: The fire is out. The button, pressed down only by a vase full of water, is now kept pressed down by an empty vase. You cross the raised bridge, open the unlocked door, and move on to the next car.
